description:
GeForce NOW connects to digital PC game stores so you can stream the library of games you already own

GeForce NOW instantly transforms nearly any laptop, desktop, Mac, SHIELD TV, Android device, iPhone, or iPad into the PC gaming rig you’ve always dreamed of.
Play the most demanding PC games and seamlessly play across your devices.
CES 2026 Announcement Summary
- GeForce NOW is expanding to more platforms than ever, highlighted by a native Linux PC app entering beta early this year and a dedicated app for Amazon Fire TV devices also launching early this year.
- Flight-simulation fans will gain flight controls support, while members everywhere will enjoy faster access to more games through a new Gaijin.net single sign-on integration.
- Members can follow updates on these upcoming features and new game releases every GFN Thursday.

Fit and Finish
- The gamepad “Hold START” hotkey has been adjusted to require a longer press before opening the GeForce NOW in-game overlay, allowing the START button to function normally in supported games like ARC Raiders.
- If a game is temporarily unavailable due to patching, its GeForce NOW detail page will now display an estimated time to completion along with any important maintenance information.

Bug Fixes
- General stability and performance improvements.

Whatcha Thinking?
- Tell us about your streaming session, or what games you want to play, or suggest improvements we can make. Use that exclamation icon to send feedback in the app and let us know what you think.
